author: Jono Brandel
title: Drink Responsibly
technology: WebGL, Three.js, Two.js, Web Audio API
description: Why not sit back and enjoy the holiday season with a drink or two. But not too many! Design and coding by jonobr1 (http://jonobr1.com). Music by Lullatone (http://lullatone.com). Clipart by Freepik (http://freepik.com)
